line_1: Like school-boys, at th' expected warning,
line_2: O Life! how pleasant in thy morning,

line_1: Like school-boys, at th' expected warning,
line_2: Young Fancy's rays the hills adorning!

line_1: Like school-boys, at th' expected warning,
I'll do it — But I give You Warning:
And the Doctor was pleas'd, tho' so short was the Warning,
line_2: To come to our Lodgings betimes in the Morning▪
